name: Reclaim (jbarthelt)
description:
Once the powerful queen of the kingdom, Scarlet Malheur now finds herself dethroned. Locked in the dungeon and left to rot, Princess Claudia LeBlanc now threatens to take her place as ruler, practically ruining everything Scarlet has worked so hard to uphold. Traverse your way through puzzling corridors and utilize magic spells to defeat all who stand in your way to help stop Claudia and reclaim what is rightfully deserved.

This was a group project created alongside fellow students in my Game Production sophomore class at college. This was our most challenging game yet!

(Some minor bugs exist, but everything is still playable!)
